code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import"../styles/Waiting.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Waiting(){const[dots,setDots]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const i=setInterval(()=>{setDots(d=>d.length>=3?"":d+".");},500);return()=>clearInterval(i);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"waiting",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"waiting__spinner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"waiting__ring"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"waiting__ring waiting__ring--2"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"waiting__title",children:["Finding Opponent",dots]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"waiting__sub",children:"Searching for a worthy challenger"})]});}
